name: Guardians of Life VR
description: Death returned! The horde of undead skeletons rises and coming for last bastion of life:Tree of Life. Take a slingshot and dont let them to enter the castle. Use magic skills and shield to cover from arrows and axes. Become a Guardian and protect last hope of life.GameplayThis is new kind of a tower defence style game in virtual reality. Tree of Life is last element of ethernal power of life. Defend the Tree, kill dark army of skeletons by slingshot ! Yes, classic slingshit now in VR. Use other unique skills and bullets like iron, fire or ice.
